question: 属する
sourceAnswer:
<read>ぞくする</read>:: to: belong-to/come-under/be-affiliated-with/be-subject-to
<read>しょくする</read>|<read>ぞくする</read>:<tag><ja>嘱する</ja></tag>:: to{} entrust | send-(a-message,-etc.)
activeAnswer:
<read>ぞくする</read>:: to: belong-to/come-under/be-affiliated-with/be-subject-to
<read>しょくする</read>|<read>ぞくする</read>:<tag><ja>嘱する</ja></tag>:: to{} entrust | send-(a-message,-etc.)
sourceMnemonic:
Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>belong</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to belong to</vocabulary>.

<ja>属する</ja> is a formal term for describing someone or something’s belonging to or being part of a group, category or classification.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the one you learned with the kanji. This kanji is going <vocabulary>to belong to</vocabulary> you.
